name: Case Management
description: Work with a case manager to create an individualized plan for your needs. Access tools to help you make positive changes and increase stability in your life. Receive support and resources to help you find assistance with childcare, schooling, housing, employment, and basic family needs.
fullDescription: Work with a case manager to create an individualized plan for your needs. Access tools to help you make positive changes and increase stability in your life. Receive support and resources to help you find assistance with childcare, schooling, housing, employment, and basic family needs.
whatTheyOffer: Work with a case manager to create an individualized plan for your needs. Access tools to help you make positive changes and increase stability in your life. Receive support and resources to help you find assistance with childcare, schooling, housing, employment, and basic family needs.
howToGetIt: To refer a client to receive Case Management services from Family Connections staff, open the link below: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1xir2jD_dsEh3Pjz8wo1BukIhvoI6Gv6R27G-mp6hT00/viewform?edit_requested=true
